headline: Is Weyerhaeuser’s 28% Slide in 2025 Creating a Mispriced Timberland Opportunity?
summary: Whether you are wondering if Weyerhaeuser is a quietly mispriced way to gain exposure to timber and real estate, or a value trap in disguise, this article will walk you through what the numbers are really saying about the stock today. Despite its strong asset base, the share price has slid, with Weyerhaeuser down roughly 2.3% over the last week, 3.5% over the past month, and 22.5% year to date, compounding to a 28.4% drop over the last year. Recent moves have come against a backdrop of...
